question: List all antiSMASH BGC categories and their descriptions.
label: Test
answer_summary_expected: There are seven BGC categories, including Polyketide (pks), Nonribosomal peptide (nrps), Ribosomally synthesized and post-translationally modified peptide (ripp), Terpene (terpene), Saccharide (saccharide), Alkaloid (alkaloid) and Other (other)
answer_sql_LLM:
SELECT identifier AS category, description AS description 
FROM antismash.gene_ontologies 
WHERE go_id = 10
answer_summary_LLM: The DataFrame contains one row, so it provides a single category ("GO:0000062") and its description ("fatty-acyl-CoA binding") related to antiSMASH BGC (Biosynthetic Gene Cluster) categories.
